00040 #ifndef _uiwidget_h
00041 #define _uiwidget_h
00042 
00043 #include "crossplatformexport.h"
00044 #include "datatypes.h"
00045 #include "vector2.h"
00046 
00047 namespace phys
00048 {
00049     class UIManager;
00050     class UILayer;
00051     namespace UI
00052     {
00053         class Button;
00054         ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00055         /// @class Widget
00056         /// @headerfile uiwidget.h
00057         /// @brief This class is the base class for all widgets.
00058         /// @details
00059         ///////////////////////////////////////
00060         class PHYS_LIB Widget
00061         {
00062             public:
00063                 enum WidgetType
00064                 {
00065                     ButtonListBox,
00066                     CheckBox,
00067                     DropDownMenu,
00068                     ListBox,
00069                     Menu,
00070                     RadioButton,
00071                     Scrollbar,
00072                     Spinner,
00073                     TextBox,
00074                     Window
00075                 };
00076             protected:
00077                 friend class phys::UIManager;
00078                 UIManager* Manager;
00079                 UILayer* Parent;
00080                 UI::Button* HoveredButton;
00081                 UI::Widget* HoveredSubWidget;
00082                 UI::Widget* SubWidgetFocus;
00083                 bool Visible;
00084                 Vector2 RelPosition;
00085                 Vector2 RelSize;
00086                 WidgetType Type;
00087                 String Name;
00088                 /// @brief For use with widget update/automation.
00089                 virtual void Update(bool Force = false) = 0;
00090                 /// @brief For use with sub-widget update/automation.
00091                 virtual void SubWidgetUpdate(bool Force = false);
00092                 /// @brief For use with sub-widget update/automation when the mouse isn't hovered.
00093                 virtual void SubWidgetFocusUpdate(bool Force = false);
00094             public:
00095                 /// @brief Standard initialization constructor.
00096                 /// @param parent The parent layer that created this widget.
00097                 Widget(const String& name, UILayer* parent);
00098                 /// @brief Standard destructor.
00099                 virtual ~Widget();
00100                 /// @brief Sets the visibility of this widget.
00101                 /// @param visible Bool determining whether or not this widget should be visible.
00102                 virtual void SetVisible(bool visible) = 0;
00103                 /// @brief Gets the visibility of this widget.
00104                 /// @return Returns a bool representing the visibility of this widget.
00105                 virtual bool IsVisible() = 0;
00106                 /// @brief Forces this widget to be shown.
00107                 virtual void Show() = 0;
00108                 /// @brief Forces this widget to hide.
00109                 virtual void Hide() = 0;
00110                 /// @brief Gets the type of widget this is.
00111                 /// @return Returns an enum value representing the type of widget this is.
00112                 WidgetType GetType() const;
00113                 /// @brief Gets the name of this widget.
00114                 /// @return Returns a String containing the name of this widget.
00115                 virtual String& GetName();
00116                 /// @brief Checks to see if the current mouse position is over this widget.
00117                 /// @return Returns a bool value, true if the mouse is over this widget, false if it's not.
00118                 virtual bool CheckMouseHover() = 0;
00119                 /// @brief Sets the relative position of this widget.
00120                 /// @details The position is relative to the screen size.  Values range from 0.0 to 1.0.
00121                 /// @param Position A vector2 representing the relative position of this widget.
00122                 virtual void SetPosition(const Vector2 Position) = 0;
00123                 /// @brief Gets the relative position of this widget.
00124                 /// @details The position is relative to the screen size.  Values range from 0.0 to 1.0.
00125                 /// @return Returns a vector2 representing the relative position of this widget.
00126                 virtual Vector2 GetPosition() = 0;
00127                 /// @brief Sets the pixel position of this widget.
00128                 /// @param Position A vector2 representing the pixel position of this widget.
00129                 virtual void SetActualPosition(const Vector2 Position) = 0;
00130                 /// @brief Sets the pixel position of this widget.
00131                 /// @return Returns a vector2 representing the pixel position of this widget.
00132                 virtual Vector2 GetActualPosition() = 0;
00133                 /// @brief Sets the relative size of this widget.
00134                 /// @details The size is relative to the screen size.  Values range from 0.0 to 1.0.
00135                 /// @param Size A vector2 representing the relative size of this widget.
00136                 virtual void SetSize(const Vector2 Size) = 0;
00137                 /// @brief Gets the relative size of this widget.
00138                 /// @details The size is relative to the screen size.  Values range from 0.0 to 1.0.
00139                 /// @return Returns a vector2 representing the relative size of this widget.
00140                 virtual Vector2 GetSize() = 0;
00141                 /// @brief Sets the pixel size of this widget.
00142                 /// @param Size A vector2 representing the pixel size of this widget.
00143                 virtual void SetActualSize(const Vector2 Size) = 0;
00144                 /// @brief Sets the pixel size of this widget.
00145                 /// @return Returns a vector2 representing the pixel size of this widget.
00146                 virtual Vector2 GetActualSize() = 0;
00147                 /// @brief Gets the hovered button within this widget, if any.
00148                 /// @return Returns a pointer to the button within this widget the mouse is hovering over, or NULL if none.
00149                 virtual Button* GetHoveredButton();
00150                 /// @brief Gets the hovered sub-widget within this widget, if any.
00151                 /// @return Returns a pointer to the sub-widget within this widget the mouse is hovering over, or NULL if none.
00152                 virtual Widget* GetHoveredSubWidget();
00153         };//widget
00154     }//UI
00155 }//phys
00156 
00157 #endif
